title: LF Top, ADC and Sup for Regular 5 man Dynamic Queue (currently Silver)
body:
Looking for a Top laner, ADC and Sup to round out a 5 man dynamic queue team.

Currently Silver and looking to climb! Looking for other Silver players that are ready to climb to Gold and Beyond!!

- Looking for players that will co-operate and communicate effectively in a team environment.
- Looking for players that will look to build solid team comps over playing what they're comfortable with.

If this interests you, leave a comment below or please contact me!

IGN: Pinkbitsftw

replies.body: I think you are already in my friend list

hey,
I am an adc/supp main, was placed in high bronze but got dropped to bronze 5 after playing with some friends that mucked around, happy to dynamic often
Hey man I was silver last season but due to placements I was put back in bronze, nevertheless I can play top relatively well {{champion:122}}
sup main keen, i have all voice chat programs and i am keen to communicate and play solid team comps :)
Hey, i main supp and adc. I'm silver as well and play quite often
I am B3 i can play any of the roles but will mostly top>ADC IGN: LegitimateDingo
